short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send Tweets from X to Arena

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A seamless bridge between X (formerly Twitter) and Arena. This extension enhances your social media workflow by allowing you to automatically cross-post your tweets to Arena with just a click.
